description: This file contains styles for the frontend of a word puzzle game application, defining the color scheme, layout, and animations for UI elements.

classes.name: App
classes.description: Main class representing the application UI which includes properties for layout and styling.

classes.name: correct-animate
classes.description: CSS class for the correct answer animation effect.

classes.name: error-animate
classes.description: CSS class for the incorrect answer animation effect.
